PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Iconic sunglasses combining timeless style with optical precision. From classic Aviators to bold Wayfarers, each frame features premium materials, UV protection, and distinctive design that has defined cool for generations.
BRAND_VALUES: Authenticity, self-expression, timeless style, and cultural relevance
VALUE_PROPOSITION: The perfect blend of iconic style and superior sun protection that transforms how you see and are seen
BRAND_PERSONALITY: Cool, confident, rebellious yet classic, culturally iconic
UNIQUE_SELLING_POINT: Premium sunglasses that don't just protect your eyes but define your style and attitude
TARGET_AUDIENCE: Style-conscious individuals aged 25-45 who value authentic design, quality craftsmanship, and making a statement with their eyewear
LENS_FEATURES: G-15 green polarized, 100% UV protection, anti-reflective coating
STYLE_PERSONA: Timeless Cool - Classic rebel with effortless confidence
WEARING_OCCASION: Driving, Beach, City Life, Travel, Everyday Style
FRAME_MATERIAL: Gold metal frame with acetate temple tips
CREATIVE_DIRECTION: Urban professional, signature style, confidence transformation, golden hour lighting
